author: Joseph Young
title: This Is the Real Risk of U.S. Recession, Not the Epic Stock Market Plunge
description: The stock market has struggled to show signs of recovery. But, it's not stocks that are placing the U.S. economy at risk of a recession. It's the upcoming trials their small businesses will face. The post This Is the Real Risk of U.S. Recession, Not the Epic …
content:
• The struggle of 30.2 million small businesses in the U.S. increases the probability of a recession in the U.S.
  • With a cash buffer of 27 days on average, millions of businesses are at risk of temporarily closing down.
